name: SRPG Studio Heroes
description:
This project is recommended for ages 17 and up for coarse language and crude humor, particularly in Viteri’s campaign. You have been warned.

A WIP full-length project to celebrate the 5th anniversary of SRPG Studio's English release and the community that has formed around it.

Features:

  • Fire Emblem-style gameplay including the weapon triangle, debuff-inflicting knives, funny single-RNG, and more!
  • Two campaigns!  Experience the story from the perspective of either the noble Leafy or the wicked (awesome!) Viteri.
  • A reclassing system that expands units' natural toolsets and allows them to fit a variety of roles.
  • No permadeath!
